fields.summary: [Python] Sustrait-related test failure in wheel tests

comments.body: [~octalene] Do you have time to work very quickly on this? Otherwise, we'll have to revert the PR from ARROW-16424
Also, we should enable Substrait in the AppVeyor build for PyArrow, to avoid being blind to such regressions.
Started a dummy AppVeyor build here to see if it reproduces there: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/pitrou/arrow/builds/45062243
